data-sync.description: Whether you're using Quran.com on your phone or your laptop, your bookmarks, last read verses, and your preferences will be available
data-sync.title:
Your data will be synced

across devices

feedback.description: Thank you for using Quran.com and we would be glad to hear your feedback on <link>feedback.quran.com</link>
feedback.title: We want to hear your thoughts

quran-foundation-link.description: Use your Quran.com login for access to QuranReflect.com ‚Äî a thriving global community engaged in Quranic reflection.
quran-foundation-link.title: Use your account across Quran.Foundation apps!

quran-growth-journey.description: Maintain your Quran reading streak and progress through your goals while building new habits
quran-growth-journey.title: Start your Quran Growth Journey!

slide-1.description:
We are very happy to announce that now you can group bookmarks under "collections"!

  • Add as many collections as you want
  • Add a bookmark to one or more collections
  • And more!
slide-1.title: Bookmarks collections are here!

audio.exp-tip:
Change the content displayed under

Settings > Word By Word
audio.exp-tip-no-select:
Tick the tooltip display option and select the

Translation and/or Transliteration option

under Settings > Word By Word, to

enable this feature.

player.mismatch: Click on "Start Over" if you would like to play {{currentReadingChapter}} instead

audio.repeat-moved: The repeat settings have moved to the audio player. Click on the <0></0> icon to access them
audio.title: Audio

community.header: Join the QDC Community of Muslim builders and technologists.
community.sub-header: Sign up for the Quran.com Discord to participate and collaborate with the leading community building Islamic tech.
community.title: Community

communication.body:
üöÄ Supercharge your progress through personalized notifications about your goal progress, maintaining streaks, and enhancing your usage of our current features.



Can we keep you in the loop through email and other channels? You're in control ‚Äì feel free to adjust these preferences anytime in your account settings.



Simply select 'Allow' for inspiring reminders or 'Not Now' to decline.
communication.header: We'd love to help you stay <boldSpan>committed and consistent</boldSpan> with your Quran Growth Journey! üìñüåü

default-description: The Quran translated into many languages in a simple and easy interface

email-verification.check-spam: Didn't receive the verification email? Check your spam inbox
email-verification.email-sent: We just sent an email to {{email}}

error.MediaVersesRangeLimitExceeded: You can only select up to {{limit}} verses at a time. Please select a smaller range.
error.email-login-fail: Failed to login with email. Please try again
error.general: Something went wrong. Please try again.
error.offline: Looks like you lost your connection. Please check it and try again.
error.pref-persist-fail: Failed to sync your settings to the cloud.
error.ranges-no-value: Range start and end must have a value
error.ranges-wrong-order: The starting verse has to be before the ending verse.

errors.account-banned: Sorry, Your account is banned. Contact Quran.Foundation
errors.banned: *Sorry, Your account is banned. Contact Quran.Foundation
errors.forgot-password-failed: Failed to send password reset email. Please try again.
errors.max: *{{fieldName}} must be less than or equal to {{max}} digits
errors.min: *{{fieldName}} must be more than or equal to {{min}} digits
errors.name: *{{fieldName}} should be letters and numbers only
errors.reset-password-failed: Failed to reset password. Please try again.

fonts.qcf-desc: King Fahad Complex (V1 and V2) Fonts provide higher quality but take longer to load.
fonts.qcf-v4-desc: Tajweed fonts were created using Easy Quran - Dar Al Marifa Tajweed Mushaf and King Fahad Glorious Quran Printing Complex (KFGQPC) - Uthmanic Hafs V4 Fonts after receiving permission from both.
fonts.tajweed-desc: Tajweed font shows a Tajweed colored Mushaf. You can read more about the Tajweed color rules <0> here </0>

footer.description:
Quran.com is a trusted platform used by millions worldwide to read, search, listen to, and reflect on the Quran in multiple languages. It provides translations, tafsir, recitations, word-by-word translation, and tools for deeper study, making the Quran accessible to everyone.

As a Sadaqah Jariyah, Quran.com is dedicated to helping people connect deeply with the Quran. Supported by Quran.Foundation, a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization, Quran.com continues to grow as a free and valuable resource for all, Alhamdullilah‚Äù
footer.hiring: We're hiring! Join the QuranFoundation team and contribute to our mission. <link>Apply now!</link>
footer.title: Read, Listen, Search, and Reflect on the Quran

fundraising.description: Monthly donations help us improve Quran.com and sustain operations so we focus less on fundraising and more on creating impact.
fundraising.title: Become A Monthly Donor

pbuh: Blessings of Allah be upon him

popup.footnote: Monthly donations allow us to focus less on fundraising
popup.text-1: We are committed to serving the world Quranic knowledge and technology, always for free.
popup.text-2: The perfect opportunity for continous charity (Sadaqa Jariyah). Invest in your Hereafter as a monthly (or one time) donor.
popup.title: Give During The Best Days!

projects-desc: Non-profit projects owned, managed, or sponsored by Quran.Foundation

search.no-results-suggestion: We could not find any matching search results for "{{searchQuery}}". try searching for a different keyword.
search.title: Search

settings.reset-notif: Your settings have been reset to the default ones
settings.title: Settings
settings.tooltip-playing-audio-helper: Show word translation in tooltip while playing ayah
settings.wbw-helper: Display the translation or transliteration directly under the word
settings.word-tooltip-helper: Display the translation or transliteration when hovering or clicking the word

shared: Link has been copied to the clipboard!

tafsir.group-message: You are reading a tafsir for the group of verses {{from}} to {{to}}
tafsir.no-text: {{tafsirName}} is not available for the current verse.
tafsir.tafsirs-desc: Read various Tafsirs of Ayah {{ayahNumber}} of Surah {{surahName}} by trusted Tafsir scholars
tafsir.title: Tafsir

themes.system-desc: The system theme automatically adopts to your light/dark mode settings

validation.invalid-email: {{field}} must be a valid email address

voice.ask-permission: Please enable microphone permission to start using Voice Search
voice.error: An error has occurred, please try again later.
voice.no-permission: It looks like you do not have the microphone permissions enabled. Please enable the microphone permissions and try again.
voice.not-supported: It looks like your browser does not support microphone. Please try a different browser.
voice.suggest: Please begin reciting and your verse will appear.
voice.suggest-subtitle: Recite any verse in Arabic, and the verse will appear

wbw-lang-summary: Word by word translation source: <link>{{source}}</link>. This source is independent of the verse translation selection.
